channel.title: remote on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in remote on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-15
item.description: Microsoft releases DirectStorage: ‘a new era of fast load times and detailed worlds in PC games’ (3 minute read) Microsoft’s DirectStorage API has arrived for Windows.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-10
item.description: Facebook plans first smartwatch for next summer with two cameras, heart rate monitor (3 minute read) Facebook’s smartwatch will feature two cameras on a detachable display.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-08
item.description: T-Mobile launches long-promised 5G home internet service (2 minute read) T-Mobile’s 5G home internet service is now available for 30 million homes in the US, 10 million of which are in rural areas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-21
item.description: The easiest way to start meditating is now in… Snapchat? (4 minute read) Snap Minis are small apps that are designed to be used through Snapchat’s chat function.
